numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed a difference between age groups.
2. Many people who are 16 years old to 24 years old think that the world is getting better.
3. Many people who are older than 40 years think that the world is getting worse.
4. I wonder what is happening in the world.
5. I wonder why some people do not discover some things.
6. I wonder why some people think that the world is getting better.
7. I wonder why some people think that the world is getting worse.
8. In my community, many people are very nice.
9. This portrays a good part of the world.
10. Personally, I say that the world is good.
12. In some countries, people say that the world is getting better.
13. In some countries, people say that the world is getting worse.
14. Some countries are below the line.
15. The headline is: Good or Evil.
